title: Greenwich
summary: Greenwich (/ˈɡrɛnɪtʃ/ (listen) GREN-itch, /ˈɡrɪnɪdʒ/ GRIN-ij, /ˈɡrɪnɪtʃ/ GRIN-itch, or /ˈɡrɛnɪdʒ/ GREN-ij[1][2]) is a town in south-east London, England, located in the historic county of Kent and the ceremonial county of Greater London.[3][4] It is situated 5.5 miles (8.9 km) east-southeast of Charing Cross.
